resources.string:
If you have any questions or messages for the Villanova MEC team, please submit them here and we will get back to you as soon as possible.\n\n
If you would like to request a ride around the Villanova campus, please check the "Request Ride" field and select your pickup and drop-off locations. If your locations are not options, select "Other" and specify in the message body.
This app needs the Location permission, please accept to use location functionality
This app needs permission to send SMS, please accept to use messaging and ride request functionality.
